mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANNUAL_VACATION_APPLICATION ( ANNUAL_VACATION_MANAGE_SEQ, USER_SEQ, TOTAL_ANNUAL_VACATION_DAYS, USED_ANNUAL_VACATION_DAYS, REMAIN_ANNUAL_VACATION_DAYS ) VALUES ( ANNUAL_VACATION_MANAGE_SEQ.nextval, #{usersSeq}, #{totalAnnualVacationDays}, 0, #{totalAnnualVacationDays} )
mapper.select: SELECT VACATION_APPLICATION_SEQ, USERS_SEQ, VACATION_TYPE_SEQ, VACATION_APPLICATION_DATE, VACATION_APPLICATION_STATUS, VACATION_START_DATE, VACATION_END_DATE FROM ANNUAL_VACATION_APPLICATION WHERE USERS_SEQ = #{usersSeq} ORDER BY VACATION_APPLICATION_DATE DESC

SELECT VACATION_APPLICATION_SEQ, USERS_SEQ, VACATION_TYPE_SEQ, VACATION_APPLICATION_DATE, VACATION_APPLICATION_STATUS, VACATION_START_DATE, VACATION_END_DATE FROM ANNUAL_VACATION_APPLICATION WHERE USERS_SEQ = #{usersSeq} AND VACATION_START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY VACATION_START_DATE
SELECT ANNUAL_VACATION_MANAGE_SEQ, USER_SEQ, TOTAL_ANNUAL_VACATION_DAYS, USED_ANNUAL_VACATION_DAYS, REMAIN_ANNUAL_VACATION_DAYS FROM ANNUAL_VACATION_APPLICATION WHERE USER_SEQ = #{usersSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VACATION_APPLICATION ( VACATION_APPLICATION_SEQ, VACATION_DRAFTER_USER_SEQ, VACATION_TYPE_SEQ, VACATION_PERMISSION_USER_SEQ, VACATION_START_DATE, VACATION_END_DATE, VACATION_APPLICATION_DATE, VACATION_APPLICATION_STATUS, VACATION_APPLICATION_REASON ) VALUES ( VACATION_APPLICATION_SEQ.nextval, #{vacation_drafter_user_seq}, #{vacation_type_seq}, #{vacation_permession_user_seq}, #{vacation_start_date}, #{vacation_end_date}, sysdate, #{vacation_application_status}, #{vacation_application_reason} )
